name: OnlineSidebar.com
overview:
OnlineSidebar.com is a provider of sidebar service which is web/online based instead of traditional sidebars which are based in languages like C, C++, or Java (OS based).

For example, sidebars like Google Desktop, Windows sidebar and All-in-one-sidebar are all based on desktop and written in non-web based languages. But OnlineSidebar.com’s services and sidebars are based on html, PHP and web languages and work only when online.

Currently, OnlineSidebar has only one sidebar, that which works inside firefox and only one utility inside the sidebar, that of note taking. But it plans to launch a desktop based online sidebar and plans to launch more utilities like online bookmarking.
